Articles.Content:
![jGuGXBh.png](http://i.imgur.com/jGuGXBh.png)

Just a place for me to share the craft that I use in my [Kerbollo Applications Program](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122490-The-Kerbollo-Applications-Program) from [GregroxMun's Apollo Applications Program Challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121201-The-Apollo-Applications-Program-1-0-Edition)

**Ninurta IB** ([Download](http://www./download/4eaerb5b7sgdzyo/Ninurta_1B.craft))

Built for looks not efficiency, thrust limiters and a partial fuel load are used to keep it from being overpowered for its job of launching a CSM into orbit

Action Groups;

Abort: Decouples Command module, Fires LES.

0: Detaches LES, used in flight to Jettison LES before entering orbit, and in abort sequence after LES has been fired

9: deploys parachute, used in abort sequence to prevent having to stage through all the empty stages.

Ninurta V ([Download](http://www./download/d8gqpohmgzozq6v/Ninurta_V.craft))

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T06:26:01Z" title="06/19/2015 06:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by Rhomphaia**
